data.title: Top - 40 - CRM 2011
data.meta_description: Top_40_CRM 2011 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Acquiring, retaining, and supporting customers is more challenging than ever before. Customer relationship management (CRM) systems has emerged as a way for businesses to streamline customer-related processes. Hosted CRM, also known as on-demand CRM, provides a simpler, faster, and more affordable way for businesses.
